channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-12104] Some optimization and bugfix for HTableMultiplexer
item.description:
Make HTableMultiplexerStatus public
Delay before resubmit.
Fix some missing counting on total failure.
Use ScheduledExecutorService to simplify the code.
Other refactoring.
item.summary: Some optimization and bugfix for HTableMultiplexer

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:

against trunk revision .

-1 tests included. The patch doesn't appear to include any new or modified tests.
Please justify why no new tests are needed for this patch.
Also please list what manual steps were performed to verify this patch.

This message is automatically generated.

+  public static final String TABLE_MULTIPLEXER_MAX_RETRY_IN_QUEUE =

+      "hbase.client.max.retried.in.queue";

Should the config be "hbase.client.max.retries.in.queue" ?


+      } catch (RuntimeException e) {

+        // To make findbugs happy

+        // Log all the exceptions and move on

Is the above desirable for IOExceptions ?
About the `RuntimeException` comments, can you say something in details?
Fix the constant name and values.
This diff is also available at https://reviews.facebook.net/D24321

Add back some deleted methods, mark them as deprecated instead.
Hi stack, I just updated the patch which adds back some methods which should have been marked as deprecated other than deleted directly. Sorry for any inconvinience.
Patch looks good to me if it passes the tests
Elliott Clark I think the failing the tests are not related to my code.
Those faliures are not related. You committing Elliott Clark or I can if you'd like.
If you want to commit that would be awesome. If not I can get it in a couple of hours if you haven't yet.
Pushed to branch-1+ Thanks for the patch Yi Deng
Thanks for the push. stack
